column5: Has anyone been to Brennan Harbour resort in Spanish Ontario ?  6 of us are thinking about heading there in July. Any reviews would be great thanks.
I don't know about that resort, but I launch by blue heron resort to fish the Spanish a lot ..they are very busy and tidy looking place

Thanks . Is there some good fishing in the area?  Is early July a good time to have good fishing there ?  My uncle went last spring for the pike opener and said they had a blast but didnt get many fish because of the messed up spring. Im hoping july is a better option
In that area, I would recommend the first 2 weeks of July or better yet the last week of June.  Good Luck.........and have fun.
The walleye fishing last yr was a riot ..lasted well into mid August ..I don't concentrate on pike on the Spanish,I prefer Cutler or Huron for the big gators
